Title: Paulette
Writer: Laurie Aubanel (scenario), Jérôme Enrico (dialogue), Jérôme Enrico (scenario), Bianca Olsen (original idea), Bianca Olsen (scenario), Cyril Rambour (scenario)
Actors: Bernadette Lafont, Carmen Maura, Dominique Lavanant, Françoise Bertin
Plot: Paulette lives alone in a housing project in the Paris suburbs. With her meager pension, she can no longer make ends meet.
